hero.title: Talk to us
hero.subtitle: We're ready to hear from you. Tell us about your church, your challenges, and your dreams. Let's think together.

whatsapp_cta.title: The fastest way to reach us
whatsapp_cta.text: Click the button below and start a direct conversation with us on WhatsApp. Tell us a little about your church and what you're looking for, and we'll respond as soon as possible.
whatsapp_cta.whatsapp_message:
Hi! 📲

I came from the **Contact page**, in the main WhatsApp section, and clicked **"Start a conversation on WhatsApp"**.

I’d like to share a bit about our church’s current moment and understand how you can guide us.

outras_formas.title: Other ways to reach us
outras_formas.subtitle: Choose the most convenient way for you

localizacao.title: Based in Brasília
localizacao.text: Our missionary family is based in Brasília, DF, but we serve churches and missions throughout Brazil and the world. We travel wherever God calls us to train, equip, and advance in the digital mission field.

cta_final.title: We're waiting for your <highlight>message</highlight>
cta_final.text: No matter the size of your church or where you are. If there's a desire to reach lives in the digital world, let's talk.
cta_final.whatsapp_message:
Hello! 🤝

I reached the **end of the Contact page** and clicked the **"Chat on WhatsApp"** button.

I’d like to open a conversation to discern the next digital mission steps for our church.

form.success: Message sent successfully! We'll respond soon.
form.error: Could not send. Please try again.

info.title: Other ways to reach us
info.whatsapp_message:

I came from the **Contact page**, in the **Other ways to reach us** section, and clicked the **WhatsApp** card.
